name: Tampere Market Hall
description: Historic market hall offering a wide selection of local produce, artisanal foods, and regional specialties.

name: St John's Church
description: Notable neo-Gothic church featuring distinctive red brick architecture and regular community events.

name: Hotel Tammer
description: Landmark hotel established in the early 20th century, combining classic elegance with modern amenities.

name: Metso Library
description: Central public library renowned for its unique honeycomb-inspired façade and extensive Finnish literature collection.

name: Café Pulteri
description: Popular café on the central square known for its freshly baked pastries and specialty coffee blends.

name: Finlayson Park
description: Urban park offering green lawns, walking paths, and scenic views adjacent to historic industrial buildings.

name: Keskustori Bus Stop A
description: Primary bus stop on the central square serving multiple city routes connecting to key districts.

name: Keskustori Bus Stop B
description: Secondary bus stop facilitating boarding for outbound routes towards the university and residential neighborhoods.

name: Keskustori Parking
description: Underground parking facility beneath the square providing 200 spaces with direct access to nearby shops.

name: Keskustori North Parking
description: Surface parking lot adjacent to the northern side of the square with easy pedestrian access.
